text: Ara allaha yake anumati debena, se chara tamra kache karo suparisa phalaprasu habe na. Abasese yakhana tadera antara theke bhaya bidurita haya, takhana tara parasparera madhye jijnasabada kare, 'tomadera raba ki balalena?' Tara uttare tara bale, ya satya tini ta-i balechena [1]' ara tini samucca, mahana
